Everybody's favorite know-it-all, Ernest P. Worrell, scares up heaps of hilarious laughs in this frightfully funny comedy! The Lovable lunkhead is in for a devil of a time when he accidentally unleashes an evil demon from its sacred tomb - causing the awakened foe to go on a devastating rampage. Ernest desperately attempts to prevent the destruction of the town, but a 200-year-old curse renders Ernest Scared Stupid! And that's when the fun and adventure begin!
